a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Health expenditure includes all financing schemes and covers all aspects of healthcare. This data is adjusted
for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
Data source: OECD Health Expenditure and Financing Database (2024)

Note: This data is expressed in
international-$
at 2015 prices.
